episode.title: Ra Voice Test - 4 Options
episode.description: Testing four Ra voice options in context with Victor and Lenny

content.speaker: Victor
content.text: Alright, so in Session 1, Don asks Ra the most fundamental question you could ask a supposed extraterrestrial intelligence: What is your purpose here? And Ra's answer... it's not what you'd expect. Listen to this.
content.next_text: We came to your peoples to enunciate the Law of One.

content.speaker: Ra_OptionA
content.text: We came to your peoples to enunciate the Law of One. We wished to impress upon those who wished to learn of unity that in unity all paradoxes are resolved; all that is broken is healed; all that is forgotten is brought to light.
content.previous_text: Alright, so in Session 1, Don asks Ra the most fundamental question you could ask a supposed extraterrestrial intelligence: What is your purpose here? And Ra's answer... it's not what you'd expect. Listen to this.

content.speaker: Lenny
content.text: Wait—enunciate? Who talks like that? And your peoples? That's... I mean, that's not how humans phrase things, right?
content.previous_text: We came to your peoples to enunciate the Law of One. We wished to impress upon those who wished to learn of unity that in unity all paradoxes are resolved; all that is broken is healed; all that is forgotten is brought to light.
content.next_text: Alright, so in Session 1, Don asks Ra the most fundamental question you could ask a supposed extraterrestrial intelligence: What is your purpose here?
